Text: I guess you've got no English subtitles for this.. love to watch it.. looks like a great film...

Yes, sorry, I maybe can get some German Subs as I ripped it from arte.tv wich is a french/german TV.

Anyway here is the IMDB link:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2357526/combined

Funny fact, is that part of the movie was filmed during gigs at "La Miroiterie" wich is the oldest and last punk squat in Paris. 
So you can see a lot of the people from the punk french scene.
